metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11039 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Function iconv_mime_decode_headers() in PHP versions 7.1.x below 7.1.30,7.2.x below 7.2.19 and 7.3.x below 7.3.6 may perform out-of-buffer read dueto integer overflow when parsing MIME headers. This may lead to informationdisclosure or crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php5 - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
libapache2-mod-php5filter - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
libphp5-embed - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php-pear - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5 - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-cgi - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-cli - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-common - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-curl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-enchant - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-fpm - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3

php5-ldap - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-mysql - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-mysqlnd - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-odbc - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-pgsql - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-pspell - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-readline - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-recode - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-snmp - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-sqlite - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-sybase - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3

php5-xmlrpc - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
php5-xsl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php5 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.29+esm3').
